quoteText: In addition, we may share certain information about you and your completed tasks to the Requester whose tasks you have completed to facilitate the service relationship and improve the website, including, for example, Contributor ID, IP Address, completed tasks, and other attributes related to your qualifications, languages, skills, and use of the website.
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
